item.title: Tips for Docker Compose
item.description: Builds, (re)creates, starts, and attaches to containers for a service. docker-compose up -d Stops containers and removes containers, networks, volumes, and images created by up. sudo docker-compose down Remove containers for services not defined in the Compose file

item.title: Setting up development environments with docker-compose
item.description: Create network docker network create -d bridge dev-net Build environment docker-compose.yaml networks: network1: name: dev-net services: db: image: mariadb:10.3 container_name: db volumes: - /d/data/mariadb/data:/var/lib/mysql - /d/data/mariadb/conf.d:/etc/mysql/conf.d environment: - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=devplayg12!
